channel.title: Is the Item Checker going to be updated?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Is the Item Checker going to be updated?" - Crusader's Sword is no longer "Unobtainable" since it can be won from the Robo Fighto.

item.title: Is the Item Checker going to be updated?
item.content:encoded:
I wondered whether Lafiel is going to update the item checker or whether it was a "one release" project?

Because BvS is constantly changing, the items are changing as well.

For example, since the introduction of ROBO FIGHTO the Crusader's Sword is no longer an "Unobtainable" item.
